DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether or not spironolactone can prevent or delay the occurrence of atrial fibrillation.
DOC.detailed_description: To determine whether or not adding spironolactone can prevent or delay the occurrence of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation in patients who have received propafenone treatment.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. 18 to 80 Y/O, 2. Paroxysmal AF. Exclusion criteria: 1. GPT>100 IU/L or tota bilirubin >2 mg/dl; 2. Creatinine > 2 mg/dl; 3. Serum potassium >= 5 mM; 4. Serum sodium <=130 mM; 5. Uric acid > 10 mg/dlã€‚
